name: World War Shooting Battle
description:
Have you ever be a part of sniper shooter games? If no then be ready for the commando front line adventure of your life. The terrorists and bad mafia have entered in the city’s territory. Gather your hunter skills and perform well for the sake of survival. The city shows the picture of real battlefield, terrorists and criminal mafia have invaded the area and want to ruin every place with their powerful weapons.

Become a real sniper hunter to vanish all the criminals from the city. Heavyguns and machinegun are used in this war. Citizens need you, they need a sniper shooter like you. Be their commando sniper hero and win the war against terrorism.
Thrilling shooting challenges to wipe out the terrorism!

*key features*
Wide variety of weapons to shoot
Real guns and snipers to kill the enemies
Be a best sniper of the history
Assault with full force to save the city
Stunning 3D graphics and best audio effects
